com.giift.sdk.data

Class Product

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.giift.sdk.data.Product
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.provider.BaseColumns

    public abstract class Product
extends java.lang.Object
implements android.provider.BaseColumns
    A product is a kind of best deal. It can be attached to a Card or to a Dmo. This is referred here as the object

      • BuildUriFromProductSetting

        public static android.net.Uri BuildUriFromProductSetting(@NonNull
                                                         android.content.Context context,
                                                         java.lang.String dmoId,
                                                         java.lang.String key,
                                                         java.lang.String keyValue)
        Get uri of a of all products of a location in the GiiftProvider
        Parameters:
        dmoId - id of the dmo
        key - key in product_settings table for which product are to be fetched(e.g location/basket)
        keyValue - value of the key field
        Returns:
        uri of the product in the GiiftProvider

      • BuildUriFromProductSettingFeatured

        public static android.net.Uri BuildUriFromProductSettingFeatured(@NonNull
                                                                 android.content.Context context,
                                                                 java.lang.String dmoId,
                                                                 java.lang.String key,
                                                                 java.lang.String keyValue)
        Get uri of a of featured products of a location in the GiiftProvider
        Parameters:
        dmoId - id of the dmo
        key - key in product_settings table for which product are to be fetched(e.g location/basket)
        keyValue - value of the key field
        Returns:
        uri of the product in the GiiftProvider

      • UpdateFromJSon

        public static android.net.Uri UpdateFromJSon(@NonNull
                                             android.content.Context context,
                                             @NonNull
                                             org.json.JSONObject obj,
                                             java.lang.String objectId)
        Update/insert a product in the GiiftProvider from its json description
        Parameters:
        context - used to access the GiiftProvider
        obj - json description of the product
        objectId - id of the object to which the product is attached. It can be a Card id or a Dmo id
